text: Infinite Food (http://8-food.com/) | Foodtech Hardware Robotics R&D | Kunming, Yunnan, China | Flexible to Full-time | INTERNS | VISA | ONSITE | Early-stage (<1 year old), flexible startup environment where your ideas and contributions are valued. Cross disciplinary R&D including mechanical engineering, machine vision, food processing, robotics, materials science, sanitation, packaging, pneumatics, hydraulics. Mechatronics PhD advisor. This is the real deal for hardware engineers: rapid prototyping of systems from components sourced at speed. Interns welcome. Salary and equity negotiable for the right candidates. Email in profile.
